text:
Welcome to your work space!

To the right, you have three tiles, a text tile, a drawing tile, and a diagram tile. In this lesson, you will use all three as you model with mathematics.

“Other Time”

There are 24 hours in a day: sleeping takes around 8 hours, students spend 7-10 hours in school, and the rest is “other time.”

Taking Tests

A study has found that it typically takes students:

  • 60 seconds to answer a multiple choice question
  • 15 seconds to write their name at the top of the test
